name: Immortal Darkness: Curse of The Pale King
description: A dark fantasy RPG dungeon crawler, with challenging real-time tactical combat, a wide variety of spells, and a dark and brooding dungeon full of lethal enemies, sadistic traps, and mind-bending puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7+ (8 / 8.1 / 10) Processor: Intel CPU Core i3-2120 (3.3 GHz) / AMD CPU FX-6300 (3.5 GHz) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (2 GB) / AMD Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7+ (8 / 8.1 / 10) Processor: Intel CPU Core i7-2600 (3.4 GHz) / AMD CPU FX-8320 (3.5 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (3 GB) / AMD Radeon RX 480 (4 GB) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
